spreads.name: Single Card
spreads.description: A simple one-card draw for daily guidance

positions.name: Focus
positions.short_description: The main energy or message for you right now
positions.detailed_description: What energy, message, or guidance does the universe want you to focus on today? What quality should you embody, what opportunity should you notice, or what wisdom should guide your choices? This card represents the most important spiritual, emotional, or practical insight for your current moment.

question_adaptations.general: The primary energy or guidance you need right now
question_adaptations.decision: The key factor to focus on when making this choice
question_adaptations.love: The most important aspect of your love life to pay attention to
question_adaptations.career: What you should focus on in your professional life today

spreads.name: 3 Cards (Past, Present, Future)
spreads.description: Classic timeline spread showing the flow of energy

positions.name: Past
positions.short_description: Past influences affecting the current situation
positions.detailed_description: What experiences, decisions, patterns, or energies from your past are directly influencing your current situation? This could be recent events, learned behaviors, past relationships, or even ancestral patterns. What foundation - positive or challenging - was laid that brings you to this moment?

question_adaptations.love: Past relationship patterns or romantic experiences shaping your current love life
question_adaptations.career: Professional experiences, education, or past career decisions influencing your current work situation
question_adaptations.spiritual: Past spiritual experiences, beliefs, or practices that inform your current spiritual journey

positions.name: Present
positions.short_description: Current energies and circumstances surrounding you
positions.detailed_description: What is the core energy, central theme, or primary dynamic of your current experience? This represents where you are right now - emotionally, spiritually, and practically. What circumstances, opportunities, or challenges are actively shaping your daily reality?

question_adaptations.love: The current state and energy of your romantic life or specific relationship
question_adaptations.career: Your present professional situation, workplace dynamics, or current career energy
question_adaptations.spiritual: Where you are right now on your spiritual path and what energies are active

positions.name: Future
positions.short_description: The likely outcome or direction you're heading
positions.detailed_description: Where is your current path leading? What outcome, opportunity, or new phase of life is emerging based on your present circumstances and choices? This represents the natural progression of current energies, not a fixed fate but a likely trajectory if things continue as they are.

question_adaptations.love: Where your romantic life is heading based on current patterns and choices
question_adaptations.career: The likely direction of your professional life and emerging career opportunities
question_adaptations.spiritual: The next phase of your spiritual development and where your practice is leading

spreads.name: 3 Cards (Mind, Body, Spirit)
spreads.description: Holistic view of your mental, physical, and spiritual state

positions.name: Mind
positions.short_description: Your mental state, thoughts, and intellectual energy
positions.detailed_description: What is the current state of your mental landscape? How are you thinking, processing information, and making decisions? This card reveals your cognitive patterns, mental clarity or confusion, intellectual strengths or blocks, and the overall energy of your thought processes. What does your mind need for optimal function?

question_adaptations.health: Your mental health, stress levels, and psychological well-being
question_adaptations.work: Your mental approach to work, concentration, and intellectual capacity for professional tasks
question_adaptations.relationships: How you're thinking about your relationships and emotional processing patterns

positions.name: Body
positions.short_description: Your physical health, energy, and material concerns
positions.detailed_description: What is your body telling you right now? This encompasses your physical health, energy levels, vitality, and your relationship with your material world - including resources, possessions, and physical environment. How well are you caring for your physical vessel and material needs?

question_adaptations.health: Your physical health, energy levels, and what your body needs for healing
question_adaptations.finances: Your material security, resources, and relationship with money and possessions
question_adaptations.career: Your physical work environment, energy for work tasks, and material career benefits

positions.name: Spirit
positions.short_description: Your spiritual connection, intuition, and higher purpose
positions.detailed_description: What is the state of your spiritual connection and higher awareness? This card reveals your relationship with your intuition, sense of purpose, connection to the divine or universal energy, and overall spiritual vitality. How aligned are you with your soul's calling and deeper wisdom?

question_adaptations.life_purpose: Your spiritual calling, soul mission, and alignment with higher purpose
question_adaptations.guidance: Messages from your higher self, spirit guides, or universal wisdom
question_adaptations.growth: Your current spiritual development and areas for deeper spiritual exploration

positions.name: Situation
positions.short_description: The current situation or challenge you're facing
positions.detailed_description: What is the true nature of the situation you're dealing with? This card reveals the core dynamics, hidden factors, and underlying energies of your current challenge or decision point. What elements - internal and external - are really at play here that you need to understand?

question_adaptations.conflict: The real nature of the conflict or tension you're experiencing
question_adaptations.decision: The true complexity and factors involved in this choice you're facing
question_adaptations.relationship: The underlying dynamics and reality of your relationship situation

positions.name: Action
positions.short_description: What action you should take or approach to use
positions.detailed_description: What is the most effective action, approach, or strategy for navigating this situation? This card provides guidance on how to move forward skillfully. What energy should you embody, what steps should you take, or what perspective should you adopt to create the best possible outcome?

question_adaptations.conflict: How to approach and resolve this conflict with wisdom and skill
question_adaptations.decision: The best approach for making this choice or moving through this decision
question_adaptations.opportunity: How to best seize this opportunity or maximize this potential

positions.name: Outcome
positions.short_description: The likely result if you take this action
positions.detailed_description: What outcome can you expect if you follow the guidance of the Action card? This shows the likely consequences, results, or new situation that will emerge from taking the recommended approach. How will this action change your circumstances and what new opportunities or challenges might arise?

question_adaptations.decision: The likely results and consequences of making this choice or taking this path
question_adaptations.conflict: How the situation will resolve and what the aftermath will look like
question_adaptations.goal: Whether you'll achieve your desired goal and what the success will look like

spreads.name: 5-Card Cross
spreads.description: Comprehensive spread covering all major aspects

positions.name: Present Situation
positions.short_description: What's happening now in your life
positions.detailed_description: The heart of your current experience and the central energy that defines what you're going through right now. This is the core theme around which all other aspects of this reading revolve. What is the primary dynamic, opportunity, or challenge that characterizes your present moment?

positions.name: Challenge
positions.short_description: What you're dealing with or need to overcome
positions.detailed_description: The primary obstacle, resistance, or growth edge that you're being asked to face in this situation. This could be an external barrier, internal fear, limiting belief, or shadow aspect that needs integration. What requires your courage, honesty, or a new approach to move through?

positions.name: Past Influences
positions.short_description: What brought you to this point
positions.detailed_description: The foundational experiences, decisions, or patterns from your past that created the conditions for your present situation. What history - recent or distant - established the energy patterns, beliefs, or circumstances that you're now working with? How did you arrive at this crossroads?

positions.name: Future Potential
positions.short_description: Where this is heading if you stay on this path
positions.detailed_description: The natural outcome or direction that your current situation is moving toward if present patterns and energies continue. What new phase of life, opportunity, or resolution is trying to emerge? This represents your trajectory, not a fixed fate.

positions.name: Advice
positions.short_description: What you need to know or do
positions.detailed_description: The wisdom, guidance, and practical steps that will help you navigate this situation most skillfully. What approach, perspective, or action will serve your highest good? How can you work with the energies present to create the most positive outcome?

spreads.name: 4-Card Decision
spreads.description: Perfect for weighing two options or choices

positions.name: Option A
positions.short_description: First choice or path available to you
positions.detailed_description: What would this choice or path bring into your life? What are the energies, opportunities, challenges, and likely outcomes associated with this option? How would choosing this direction change your circumstances and what would you need to embrace or release?

positions.name: Option B
positions.short_description: Second choice or path available to you
positions.detailed_description: What would this alternative choice or path manifest in your life? What different energies, experiences, and outcomes are associated with this option? How would this direction change your life trajectory and what would it require of you?

positions.name: What Helps
positions.short_description: Factors that support your decision or goal
positions.detailed_description: What resources, strengths, support systems, or favorable circumstances are working in your favor? What advantages do you have that you might not be fully recognizing? What allies, skills, or opportunities can you draw upon to make this decision wisely and implement it successfully?

positions.name: What Hinders
positions.short_description: Obstacles or challenges to consider
positions.detailed_description: What obstacles, limitations, fears, or challenges might complicate this decision or its implementation? What internal resistance, external barriers, or blind spots should you be aware of? This isn't meant to discourage you, but to help you navigate potential difficulties consciously.

spreads.name: 6-Card Relationship
spreads.description: Deep dive into relationship dynamics and potential

positions.name: You
positions.short_description: Your role and feelings in this relationship
positions.detailed_description: What energy, qualities, or patterns are you bringing to this relationship? How are you showing up emotionally, mentally, and spiritually in this connection? What are your conscious and unconscious contributions to the dynamic between you?

positions.name: The Other
positions.short_description: Their role and feelings in this relationship
positions.detailed_description: What energy, qualities, or patterns is the other person bringing to this relationship? How are they approaching this connection and what might their feelings, motivations, or unconscious patterns be? What is their contribution to the dynamic?

positions.name: The Relationship
positions.short_description: The dynamic and energy between you both
positions.detailed_description: What is the essential nature of the connection between you? What dynamic is created when your energies combine? This card reveals the relationship as its own entity - the unique chemistry, patterns, and spiritual purpose of your bond.

positions.name: Past Foundation
positions.short_description: What this relationship is built upon
positions.detailed_description: What experiences, agreements, karmic connections, or circumstances originally brought you together? What is the historical or spiritual foundation of this relationship? How did your connection begin and what early patterns were established?

positions.name: Present State
positions.short_description: Where the relationship stands right now
positions.detailed_description: What is the current condition and energy of your relationship? What phase are you in together and what themes are most active between you right now? How healthy, challenged, or evolving is your connection at this moment?

positions.name: Future Potential
positions.short_description: Where this relationship is heading
positions.detailed_description: What is the natural direction or potential outcome of this relationship based on current dynamics? What new phase, deeper connection, or resolution is trying to emerge? Where could this relationship grow if you both remain conscious and committed?

spreads.name: 7-Card Horseshoe
spreads.description: Classic fortune-telling spread for comprehensive guidance

positions.name: Past
positions.short_description: Past influences affecting the situation
positions.detailed_description: What foundational experiences, decisions, or karmic patterns from your past are actively influencing this situation? These could be recent events or ancient soul patterns that established the conditions you're now working with.

positions.name: Present
positions.short_description: Current state of affairs
positions.detailed_description: The immediate reality of your situation right now. What energies, circumstances, and opportunities are active in your current experience? This is your starting point for the journey ahead.

positions.name: Hidden Influences
positions.short_description: Unseen factors affecting the situation
positions.detailed_description: What forces, motivations, or dynamics are operating beneath the surface that you may not be fully aware of? This could include other people's hidden agendas, your own unconscious patterns, or spiritual influences guiding this situation.

positions.name: Your Approach
positions.short_description: How you should handle this situation
positions.detailed_description: What strategy, attitude, or energy will serve you best in navigating this situation? How should you approach the challenges and opportunities ahead? What qualities should you embody to achieve the best outcome?

positions.name: Others Around You
positions.short_description: How other people affect this situation
positions.detailed_description: What role are other people playing in this situation? How are family, friends, colleagues, or even strangers influencing the outcome? What support or obstacles might come from your social environment?

positions.name: Hopes and Fears
positions.short_description: Your inner emotions about the outcome
positions.detailed_description: What are you deeply hoping for in this situation, and what are you most afraid might happen? This card reveals your emotional investment and the subconscious desires or anxieties that are influencing your choices.

positions.name: Final Outcome
positions.short_description: The likely result or conclusion
positions.detailed_description: What is the most probable outcome or resolution of this situation based on current energies and choices? This represents where all the influences and actions in this reading are leading you.

spreads.name: 7-Card Horseshoe (Apex Focus)
spreads.description: Horseshoe variation with the key card at the top center

positions.name: Past Foundation
positions.short_description: Deep past influences and foundations
positions.detailed_description: The deep historical roots of this situation - ancient patterns, soul lessons, or foundational experiences that established the groundwork for everything that followed. What old energy or karma is finally ready to be resolved?

positions.name: Recent Past
positions.short_description: Recent events affecting the situation
positions.detailed_description: The immediate history that led to this moment - recent decisions, events, or changes that directly created your current circumstances. What recent shift set this situation in motion?

positions.name: Present Influences
positions.short_description: Current forces at play
positions.detailed_description: The active energies and influences that are shaping your experience right now. What forces - internal and external - are currently most powerful in determining how this situation unfolds?

positions.name: Key Focus
positions.short_description: The central theme or most important factor
positions.detailed_description: The heart of this entire situation - the most crucial element that everything else revolves around. This is your primary focus point, the key insight or energy that unlocks understanding of the whole picture. What is absolutely essential to grasp here?

positions.name: Future Influences
positions.short_description: Coming energies and influences
positions.detailed_description: What new energies, opportunities, or influences are approaching that will shape the next phase of this situation? What forces are gathering that will soon become active in your experience?

positions.name: Near Future
positions.short_description: What's likely to happen soon
positions.detailed_description: The immediate next steps or events that are likely to unfold in the coming weeks or months. What should you prepare for or be ready to embrace as this situation evolves?

positions.name: Final Outcome
positions.short_description: The ultimate result or destination
positions.detailed_description: Where this entire journey is ultimately leading - the final resolution, transformation, or new beginning that this situation is guiding you toward. What is the deeper purpose being served by everything you're experiencing?

spreads.name: Celtic Cross
spreads.description: The most comprehensive traditional tarot spread

positions.name: Present Situation
positions.short_description: The heart of the matter - what's happening now
positions.detailed_description: The absolute core of your current experience and the central energy that defines what you're dealing with at the deepest level. This is the heart of the matter around which all other aspects of this reading revolve. What is the essential theme or primary dynamic of your present reality?

positions.name: Challenge
positions.short_description: What crosses you or challenges you in this situation
positions.detailed_description: What fundamentally opposes, tests, or challenges the energy of your present situation? This crossing energy often reveals the core lesson, fear, or transformation you're being asked to face. This isn't necessarily negative - it's what you must work through consciously to achieve resolution and growth.

positions.name: Distant Past
positions.short_description: The foundation or root of the situation
positions.detailed_description: The deep historical roots of this situation - foundational experiences, karmic patterns, ancestral influences, or soul-level agreements that established the very basis of what you're experiencing now. What ancient energy or original wound is finally ready to be healed or transformed?

positions.name: Recent Past
positions.short_description: Recent events affecting the current situation
positions.detailed_description: The immediate history that led directly to this moment - recent decisions, events, relationships, or changes that created the specific circumstances you're now navigating. What recent shift or development set the current situation in motion?

positions.name: Possible Outcome
positions.short_description: What may come to pass if things continue as they are
positions.detailed_description: The natural trajectory and likely outcome if current patterns, energies, and choices continue unchanged. This represents potential, not fate - what wants to emerge based on present circumstances. How might this situation resolve if you stay on your current path?

positions.name: Near Future
positions.short_description: What will happen in the immediate future
positions.detailed_description: What is approaching in the immediate future - events, opportunities, or changes that are already in motion and likely to manifest in the coming weeks or months. What should you prepare for or be ready to embrace as this situation evolves?

positions.name: Your Approach
positions.short_description: How you see yourself in this situation
positions.detailed_description: How you perceive yourself and your role in this situation, including your conscious attitudes, strategies, and the energy you believe you're bringing to the experience. This reflects your self-awareness and chosen approach - how you think you're handling things and what you believe about your own power and responsibility.

positions.name: External Influences
positions.short_description: How others see you or external factors at play
positions.detailed_description: How other people perceive you and your situation, plus the external forces, environmental factors, or circumstances beyond your direct control that are influencing the outcome. What is the world around you contributing to this experience?

positions.name: Hopes and Fears
positions.short_description: Your inner emotions and subconscious feelings
positions.detailed_description: Your deepest hopes, fears, and emotional investment in this situation. What are you yearning for at a soul level, and what are you most afraid might happen? This card reveals the subconscious emotional currents that are secretly influencing your choices and reactions.

positions.name: Final Outcome
positions.short_description: The ultimate result of the situation
positions.detailed_description: The final resolution, culmination, or transformation that this entire experience is leading toward. This is where all the energies, lessons, and influences in this reading ultimately converge. What is the deeper purpose being served, and what new beginning emerges from this ending?

spreads.name: Year Ahead
spreads.description: A comprehensive 12-card spread for annual guidance, with one card for each month of the coming year

positions.name: January
positions.short_description: Energy and themes for January
positions.detailed_description: What energy, opportunities, or lessons will characterize the first month of your year? What should you focus on as you begin this new cycle? What seeds are being planted in January that will grow throughout the year?

question_adaptations.career: Professional opportunities or challenges coming in January
question_adaptations.love: Romantic energy and potential developments in January
question_adaptations.health: Physical and mental wellness focus for January

positions.name: February
positions.short_description: Energy and themes for February
positions.detailed_description: What will February bring into your life? How will the energy shift from January, and what new developments or deepening themes should you prepare for? What relationships or partnerships may be highlighted this month?

question_adaptations.career: Professional partnerships or team dynamics in February
question_adaptations.love: Relationship developments and romantic energy in February
question_adaptations.personal: Social connections and friendships in February

positions.name: March
positions.short_description: Energy and themes for March
positions.detailed_description: As spring begins, what new growth and action will March inspire? What projects, goals, or aspects of yourself are ready to emerge? How can you harness the fresh energy of this transitional month?

question_adaptations.career: Professional initiatives and bold moves in March
question_adaptations.creative: Creative projects and artistic expression in March
question_adaptations.personal: Personal growth and new adventures in March

positions.name: April
positions.short_description: Energy and themes for April
positions.detailed_description: What will bloom in April as your year gains momentum? What opportunities for growth, creativity, or manifestation will present themselves? How can you nurture what you've planted in earlier months?

question_adaptations.creative: Artistic and creative breakthroughs in April
question_adaptations.career: Professional growth and visible progress in April
question_adaptations.personal: Self-expression and personal flowering in April

positions.name: May
positions.short_description: Energy and themes for May
positions.detailed_description: What stability, pleasure, or material progress will May offer? How can you ground yourself and enjoy the fruits of your earlier efforts? What sensual or practical matters need attention?

question_adaptations.finances: Financial opportunities and material gains in May
question_adaptations.health: Physical wellness and body care in May
question_adaptations.home: Home, family, and domestic matters in May

positions.name: June
positions.short_description: Energy and themes for June
positions.detailed_description: As spring transitions to summer, what communication, learning, or social connections will June highlight? What new information, skills, or relationships will become important? How will your thinking evolve?

question_adaptations.education: Learning opportunities and skill development in June
question_adaptations.social: Social connections and community involvement in June
question_adaptations.career: Professional networking and communication in June

positions.name: July
positions.short_description: Energy and themes for July
positions.detailed_description: What will July illuminate in your emotional world and family life? How can you honor your intuition and inner wisdom during this month? What nurturing or protective instincts will be activated?

question_adaptations.family: Family relationships and domestic harmony in July
question_adaptations.emotional: Emotional healing and intuitive development in July
question_adaptations.spiritual: Spiritual practices and inner guidance in July

positions.name: August
positions.short_description: Energy and themes for August
positions.detailed_description: What will August call forth in terms of your personal power, creativity, and self-expression? How can you shine your light most brightly? What leadership opportunities or creative projects will demand your attention?

question_adaptations.career: Leadership opportunities and professional recognition in August
question_adaptations.creative: Major creative projects and artistic expression in August
question_adaptations.personal: Personal empowerment and self-confidence in August

positions.name: September
positions.short_description: Energy and themes for September
positions.detailed_description: As autumn approaches, what practical matters, health concerns, or daily routines will September ask you to refine? How can you improve your systems and serve others more effectively? What details need attention?

question_adaptations.health: Health routines and wellness practices in September
question_adaptations.work: Daily work routines and productivity in September
question_adaptations.service: How you can serve others and contribute in September

positions.name: October
positions.short_description: Energy and themes for October
positions.detailed_description: What balance, relationships, or partnerships will October highlight? How can you create more harmony in your life? What decisions about cooperation, justice, or aesthetics will you face?

question_adaptations.relationships: Relationship decisions and partnership developments in October
question_adaptations.legal: Legal matters and issues of fairness in October
question_adaptations.creative: Artistic collaborations and aesthetic projects in October

positions.name: November
positions.short_description: Energy and themes for November
positions.detailed_description: What deep transformation, healing, or release will November facilitate? How can you work with intense energies for profound change? What hidden aspects of yourself or your life will emerge?

question_adaptations.healing: Deep healing work and emotional transformation in November
question_adaptations.finances: Shared resources and financial transformation in November
question_adaptations.spiritual: Spiritual transformation and mystical experiences in November

positions.name: December
positions.short_description: Energy and themes for December
positions.detailed_description: As the year completes its cycle, what wisdom, expansion, or spiritual understanding will December offer? How will you integrate the year's lessons? What larger perspective or philosophical insights will emerge?

question_adaptations.spiritual: Spiritual growth and expanded consciousness in December
question_adaptations.education: Teaching, learning, and sharing wisdom in December
question_adaptations.travel: Physical or mental journeys and expanded horizons in December

simple.name: Simple
simple.description: Quick, easy spreads for daily guidance

timeline.name: Timeline
timeline.description: Spreads that show the flow of time

decision.name: Decision Making
decision.description: Spreads for weighing options and making choices

relationship.name: Relationships
relationship.description: Spreads focused on love, friendship, and connections

wellness.name: Wellness
wellness.description: Spreads for health, balance, and personal growth

metadata.description: Enhanced tarot spread configuration with rich position meanings and RAG mappings
